input.sentences: there where a lot of cool buildings .
and a lot of neat classic cars .
we may come back some day .
output.sentences: Peter was driving home one day, feeling lonely, and decided to stop at a famous location he had never visited.
He was surprised at all the cool building on the lot.
He was even more surprised when he saw  a lot of really neat classic cars.
He really enjoyed his short side-trip, and the freemason symbol reminded him of his father and made him feel very at home.
On his way out he signed up to be a patron and a volunteer, saying the place really made his day.
